scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ sushiswap/bar subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:ropsten: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ hodlarchitect/bar ./subgraph.yaml --access-token 0e74c2eb02f042458b9b1756f9e3e270
scripts.all-deploy: yarn prepare:ropsten && yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:bsc-testnet: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ hodlarchitect/bsc-tnet-bar ./subgraph.yaml --access-token 0e74c2eb02f042458b9b1756f9e3e270
scripts.deploy-local: yarn create-local && graph deploy --node https://test-graph.hodlverse.com/graph/  hodlarchitect/bsc-tnet-bar
scripts.all-deploy-bsc-testnet: yarn prepare:bsc-testnet && yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn deploy-local
